resources.string: from Feburary 17th to 19th on your calendars, as Sntexpo will keep you engrossed in a plethora of professional shows, competitions, sports and events that have a lot to offer to everybody.its all converging under one banner, one can expect to go back inspired.

Since last three years Science and Tech Expo has experienced delightful musical extravaganza with celebrity singers from Hindi and Odia film Industries. It is distinguished with Amit Sana, Indian Idol 1 finalist , Rajdeep Chatterjee Indian idol 4 contestant and famous playback singers like Ira Mohanty and Navya Jaiti of ollywood. Science and Tech Expo 2K18 is going to continue its tradition of hosting tuneful, amusing and entertaining cultural nights with melodious music and spontaneous dance performances. Hold your breath and stay tuned with us for being entertained.

Science Tech Expo is the mega annual tech fest organised by GIET, Gunupur(Autonomous) which nourishes the innovator in each and every engineer. It provides a platform to realise an individuals dream and imagination. On the precipice of digital evolution.
